channel.title: Help Help Help!
channel.description:
So I add a hostname ip with no-ip. I check it so I can use it. But I have a wireless connection, and my dad gets internet from his router. So I setup portfowarding. No download needed I don't believe, then the server still says Error Connecting to Server when I use the ip. (I did click runserver.bat)
Also, when I edit the server, save the file, and use the compiler, the edits don't take place. SO PLEASE REPLY FAST. I mainly need help with the first problem.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 17, 2008, 07:56:53 PM[/size][hr]HELPPPPP

item.title: Help Help Help!
item.dc:creator: @Green020395 Green020395
item.description:
@Green020395 wrote:

So I add a hostname ip with no-ip. I check it so I can use it. But I have a wireless connection, and my dad gets internet from his router. So I setup portfowarding. No download needed I don’t believe, then the server still says Error Connecting to Server when I use the ip. (I did click runserver.bat)

Also, when I edit the server, save the file, and use the compiler, the edits don’t take place. SO PLEASE REPLY FAST. I mainly need help with the first problem.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 17, 2008, 07:56:53 PM[/size][hr]HELPPPPP
